text:
Here is some recent news relating to the stock symbol XLF:
- The S&P 500 slumped more than 4% in April, ending a five-month winning streak due to inflation concerns.
- 15 out of 23 financial stocks delivered EPS wins, with stable consumer demand.
- BofA saw clients retract $2 billion last week as the S&P dropped.
- CleanSpark topped the week's financial gainers, while Coinbase fell the most.
- Wall Street's April pullback intensified as the S&P 500 had its worst week in over a year.
- 15 out of 20 S&P 500 financial stocks delivered EPS wins, and a rebound in investment banking aided major U.S. banks.
